---
title: "About LIFE"
---

LIFE (**L**und **I**nternational **Fe**llowship) is the English-speaking Christian fellowship of [Västerkyrkan](https://www.vasterkyrkan.nu/) in Lund, Sweden.

This website provides [general information about LIFE](index.qmd), along with discussion materials for small groups following [The Chosen](https://thechosen.tv) series.

You can find us at :round_pushpin: [Byggmästaregatan 21](https://share.google/RIPZ0gVqJDdsU9Og8). For service times and additional details, please see the [frontpage](index.qmd).
